definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: Mannitol accumulates more than other little molecular carbohydrates in A. mellea.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇是蜜环菌体内积累较多的小分子糖类成分。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of mannitol on brain edema after cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨甘露醇对脑出血后脑水肿的影响。

sentences.english: Although mannitol can be absorbed by the gastrointestinal, but does not accumulate in the body.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇虽可被人的胃肠所吸收，但在体内并不蓄积。

sentences.english: Objective To study the side effect on mannitol to the prognosis of spontaneous cerebral hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究甘露醇对自发性脑出血预后的不良影响。

sentences.english: The urinary concentrations of lactulose and mannitol were determined by a refractive index detector .
sentences.chinese: 上用示差检测器测定尿液中乳果糖和甘露醇的浓度。

sentences.english: The addition of mannitol inhibits the formation and growth of callus.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇的添加抑制了愈伤组织的诱导和生长。

sentences.english: This effect is significantly more pronounced than that of an equivalent osmotic load of mannitol.
sentences.chinese: 与相同渗透负荷的甘露醇相比，这种效果更为明显。

sentences.english: The effect of small dosage manicol in prevention and cure of delayed traumatic Intracranial hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 小剂量甘露醇防治迟发性外伤性颅内血肿的作用。

sentences.english: Mannitol is given intraoperatively to help protect against renal damage from myoglobinuria .
sentences.chinese: 手术中使用甘露醇来保护肌红蛋白尿对肾脏的损害。

sentences.english: Conclusion Dmannitol and allantoin were isolated from Cistanche salsa for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 结论甘露醇与尿囊素为首次从盐生肉苁蓉中分离得到。

sentences.english: Mannitol is usually used as a cryoprotectant and an excipient during pharmaceutical freeze-drying.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇是药品冷冻干燥中常用的低温保护剂和赋形剂。

sentences.english: Two methods for the determination of mannitol in Cordyceps sinensis (Berk. ) Sacc. were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比较了测定冬虫夏草中甘露醇含量的两种方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application of indwelling needle in transfusing mannitol in vein.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉留置针在静脉输注甘露醇中的应用。

sentences.english: By the reaction of mannitol and hydrobromic acid.
sentences.chinese: 由甘露醇与氢溴酸反应制得。

sentences.english: Low temperature and mannitol pretreatment favor the maintaining of microspore activity.
sentences.chinese: 低温和甘露醇预处理都有利于保持小孢子的活力。

definition: sorbitol C6H14O6 (sugar substitute and mild laxative)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
